## Importing Geospatial Data

### Geo Boundaries

```{r}
geoNGA <- st_read("data/geospatial/",
                  layer = "geoBoundaries-NGA-ADM2") %>% 
  st_transform(crs = 26392)
```

### NGA

```{r}
NGA <- st_read("data/geospatial/",
               layer = "nga_admbnda_adm2_osgof_20190417") %>%
  st_transform(crs = 26392)
```
